title: Foundation blogging {{ step2.stepItem1 }}

stepItems.title: Pay
stepItems.help: It's a one off payment of $419, you will not be charged again.

stepItems.title: What website is the work for?
Create a login
stepItems.description: Add a new user to your site admin with the details shown below. Instructions for: Shopify, adding a staff member, Bigcommerce, adding a user.

stepItems.title: Do you have any topic ideas for the blog posts?
stepItems.help:
• If a particular post has been popular in the past writing a similar one now could be too
  • Have your competitors had strong success with any topics
  • Is there anything that's very current and talked-about on social media

stepItems.title: Can your writer start writing straight away or do you want to approve the topics first?
stepItems.help:
• For the fastest work, if you answer all questions in detail it's best to let the writer get writing straight away
  • You can approve the post drafts before publishing (below) if you like

stepItems.title: Are there any keywords you'd like to include?
stepItems.help:
• If you're running an AdWords campaign with keywords that convert well, tell us about them here
  • Look in your analytics for keywords that already drive traffic to your site
  • If you have a search function on your site these can be a great source too
  • The keywords will be included naturally for maximum SEO benefit

stepItems.title: Are there particular products/collections/pages or other places you'd like to link to?
stepItems.help:
• Paste their URLs in here
  • Aim for at least three links per post
  • Choose things in harmony with your desired topics

stepItems.title: What are the main call to actions for the posts?
stepItems.help:
• A call to action is the action you'd ideally like the reader to complete
  • Things like browse to a product, sign up to your newsletter or subscribe to your blog
  • It's important to have a call to action so that your blog converts readers to do something valuable to your business rather than being a passive visit

stepItems.title: Are you happy for the posts to be published immediately or would you like to review them first?
Write about these topics or come up with similar ideas: {{ step3.stepItem1 }}
Get writing straight away or get approval for the topics, the customer would like: {{ step3.stepItem2 }}

steps.title: Consult and write the blogging strategy

stepItems.title: Consult and write the blogging strategy
Produce the blogging plan document

steps.title: Write three 600-800 word blog posts structured for best SEO

stepItems.title: Include these keywords naturally (no excessive repetition): {{ step3.stepItem3 }}
Choose great titles to entice readers, include keywords
Make sure the posts are split into sections, each with a heading (the headings should be H2, H3 etc. HTML tag not H1)
Feature and link to these URLs:
Include this call to action:
Write between 600-800 words for each post
Include three images per post (quality, interesting images perhaps taken from the website)
Publish the posts immediately or send drafts: the customer would like... {{ step3.stepItem6 }}
How happy are you with the work completed?
Payout project manager
Payout fixer

description:
Having a blogging plan is an often overlooked but key part of having a blog that generates traffic. This job includes everything from the Three blog posts job plus it delivers a strategy and topics you can take forward month-to-month.

It's more than being organised: you'll benefit from an experienced online marketer who's worked on successful blogging strategies for leading e-commerce sites.
